live_updates: Technicians continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, we expect that this will take a few hours. Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Technicians will continue working to restore service and we will have an update in the morning.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
35901.summary: Some customers in Mayne Island are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
35901.title: Apr 7 – Mayne Island | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
